tool_description: Creates daily summaries by analyzing multiple journal entries from the same day, highlighting themes, moods, and key events.

entry_texts.description: Array of journal entry texts from the same day

target_date.description: The date for which to generate the summary

summary_length.description: Length of summary: brief, standard, detailed

include_mood_analysis.description: Whether to include mood trends in the summary

highlight_themes.description: Whether to identify and highlight recurring themes

error_messages: No entries provided: Supply at least one journal entry text for summarization.
Invalid target date: Use ISO 8601 format for the target_date parameter.
Invalid summary length: Use one of [brief, standard, detailed].
Too many entries: Maximum 50 entries can be processed in a single summary.
usage: Provide entry_texts array and target_date for the day being summarized. Customize summary_length and enable mood/theme analysis as needed. Returns comprehensive daily summary with insights.

key_themes.description: Main themes identified across the day's entries

entry_count.description: Number of entries included in the summary

summary_date.description: Date for which the summary was generated
